item.title: ID-78 West at ID-45
item.description: ID-78 West at ID-45 in Owyhee County. The shields are the new style of Idaho state highway shields.

item.title: ID-78 West at ID-45
item.description: ID-78 West at ID-45 in Owyhee County. Use ID-45 north for Nampa; ID-78 west for Marsing. The shields are the new style of Idaho state highway shields.

item.title: End ID-45 North at BL-84
item.description: End ID-45 North at BL-84 in Nampa. Turn right on 11th Ave. South for BL-84 east to Boise. Continue straight on 2nd St. South for BL-84 west to Caldwell.

item.title: ID-45 North (12th Ave S) at 2nd St. South
item.description: ID-45 North (12th Ave S) at 2nd St. South in downtown Nampa. Turn left to continue north on ID-45 and for BL-84.

item.title: ID-45 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance maker on ID-45 north. Distance to Nampa, Meridian, and Boise.

item.title: ID-45 North - Melba Junction
item.description: ID-45 north at Melba Road east to Melba.

item.title: ID-45 North - Melba Junction
item.description: ID-45 north approaching Melba Road.

item.title: ID-45 North - Canyon County
item.description: ID-45 north in Canyon County.

item.title: ID-45 North - Melba
item.description: ID-45 North at Ferry Road junction to Melba. Also turn right for Noble Island fishing access.

item.title: ID-45 North - Canyon County / Snake River
item.description: Entering Canyon County on ID-45 north at the Snake River bridge.

item.title: ID-45 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-45 north. Distance to Melba, Nampa, and Boise.

item.title: BL-84 East (3rd St.) at ID-45
item.description: BL-84 East (3rd St.) at ID-45 in Nampa. Continue straight for ID-45 south to Murphy and Silver City. Turn left on 11th Ave. to continue east on BL-84 to Meridian and Boise.

item.title: ID-78 East at ID-45
item.description: ID-78 east to Murphy at ID-45 north to Nampa.

item.title: End ID-45 South at ID-78
item.description: End ID-45 south at ID-78. Use ID-78 west for Marsing. Use ID-78 east for Murphy, the Owyhee County Seat.

item.title: End ID-45 South at ID-78
item.description: End ID-45 south at ID-78. A short connector road links ID-45 south with ID-78 west.

item.title: End ID-45 South at ID-78
item.description: End ID-45 south at ID-78. Use ID-78 south for Murphy and Grand View. Use ID-78 north for Marsing.

item.title: End ID-45 South at ID-78
item.description: End ID-45 south at ID-78.

item.title: Snake River Canyon Scenic Byway
item.description: Snake River Canyon Scenic Byway on Map Rock Road West, at ID-45 junction.

item.title: Snake River Canyon Scenic Byway
item.description: Snake River Canyon Scenic Byway on Map Rock Road West, at ID-45 junction.

item.title: Snake River Canyon Scenic Byway
item.description: Snake River Canyon Scenic Byway on Map Rock Road West, at ID-45 junction.

item.title: ID-45 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-45 south to Murphy, Silver City, and Grand View.

item.title: BL-84 West at ID-45
item.description: BL-84 West (11th Ave. South) at ID-45. Turn right on 2nd St. South to continue west on BL-84 towards Caldwell and Marsing. Continue ahead on 11th Ave. South for ID-45 south towards Murphy.

item.title: ID-78 East Approaching ID-45
item.description: Junction ID-45 north on ID-78 east.

item.title: ID-78 East Approaching ID-45
item.description: Junction ID-45 to Melba on ID-78 east.

item.title: ID-78 East at ID-45
item.description: ID-78 east to Murphy at ID-45 north to Nampa.

item.title: ID-78 East Approaching ID-45
item.description: Junction ID-45 on ID-78 east in Owyhee County.

item.title: ID-78 East at ID-45
item.description: Junction ID-45 north to Nampa on ID-78 east Owyhee County.

item.title: ID-78 East At ID-45 North
item.description: ID-78 east at ID-45 north in Owyhee County.

item.title: Jct. ID-45 on ID-78 East
item.description: Junction ID-45 on ID-78 east in Owyhee County.
